body.title: Cosmic Byte Ares Pro Wireless Gamepad for PC, Android, iOS – Tri-Mode (2.4GHz, Bluetooth, Wired), Hall Effect Joysticks & Triggers, 1000Hz Polling, Backlit Buttons, Turbo, Macro Button, 3.5mm Audio Port (Black)
body.description:
About this item
🎮 Tri-Mode Connectivity: Seamlessly switch between 2.4GHz Wireless (Dongle), Bluetooth, and Wired (USB-C) modes for versatile use across devices.
⚡ 1000Hz Polling Rate: Ultra-fast response time ensures near-zero input lag for competitive performance.
🕹️ Hall Effect Joysticks & Triggers: Magnetic sensors offer superior precision and durability, eliminating stick drift over time.
🎧 Wireless 3.5mm Audio Port: Connect your headset wirelessly via dongle mode and enjoy in-game audio and voice chat.
🎯 Dedicated Macro Button: Programmable rear button lets you assign complex inputs for rapid actions.
🔫 Turbo Function with Speed Adjustment: Customize turbo speed for button mashing in FPS, fighting, and arcade games.
🧲 Textured Hand Grip: Anti-slip design for long hours of comfortable gameplay.
Show More
top_reviews:
The  controller doesn't works for Android, it has some software/Driver issues for Android game. Its connection doesn't makes sense where joystics for mobile UI BUT doesn't works in game or emulator. I ordered a replacement will let you guys know.The  controller doesn't works for Android, it has some software/Driver issues for Android game. Its connection doesn't makes sense where joystics for mobile UI BUT doesn't works in game or emulator. I ordered a replacement will let you guys know.Follow up on controller after replacement, it has the same issue, L Stick, R Stick D Pad, andoid emulator doesn't recognize the device in both xinput and andoid. Anyone purchasing it's perfect controller but emulation is also one of your priority, avoid it at all cost.
